# Packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
```

# Load Data

```{r}
df1 <- read.csv((here("data_raw", "CU_ACAD_DEPT_WHEN_OFF_ENRL.csv"))) |> clean_names()
```

# Select Relevant Data 

```{r} 
df2 = df1 |>
  pivot_wider(names_from = "subject", values_from = "section")
```
